title: Thank you season 5
body: So ends another season of ranked in LoL.  I would like to thank every terrible team, every shitty player I have had.  Thank you for continuing to prove that no matter how good the individual, no matter how hard they try, you can ALWAYS be brought down by trash.  Thank you for again proving that a person's individual skill doesn't matter, only that RNGesus bless you with enough non-mouth breathers in a row.
